member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileProviderStateFlags
member.summary: Class that defines the state flags for the ICogImageFileProvider interface. Each static field in this class defines a single bit flag. These flags may appear in the EventArgs of a Changed event fired by any class implementing ICogImageFileProvider.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile

remarks.PARA: The supports generic access to image files using any of the registered image file providers.
If you know the image file format ahead of time or if you need specific image file functionality, you can use the appropriate image file provider interface, rather than .

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.SupportedFileTypes
member.summary: File extensions of image file types that are supported.

remarks.PARA: Returns an that contains the file extensions of the supported image file types.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Determine how many image file types are supportedDim FileTypes as CogStringCollection Dim FileTypes As New CogStringCollection FileTypes = imagefile.SupportedFileTypes MessageBox.Show("Number of supported file types: " + FileTypes.Count)

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Provider
member.summary: The image file provider for the current open file or 0 if there is no file open.

remarks.PARA: Returns the image file provider for the currently open file or NULL if no file is open. You can use the to query for a specific interface of an underlying image file provider. For example, a client control may use this property to display TIFF-specific property pages.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Get file provider Dim objImageFileProvider As Object objImageFileProvider = imagefile.Provider

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.FilterText
member.summary: A string suitable for displaying in a CommonDialog Control.

remarks.PARA: A string that contains the filter text used by the Filter property of a CommonDialog control to select various types of image files.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Use the FilterText property objCommonDialog.Filter = ImageFile.FilterText

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.OpenMode

remarks.PARA: Mode in which the file was opened, or if no file is open. This is a read only property.

member.summary: Mode in which the file was opened.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.Visionpro.ImageFile
If imagefile.OpenMode = CogImageFileModeConstants.Write Then MessageBox.Show("File Is Open in Write Mode") End If

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.FileName
member.summary: Name of last opened file.

remarks.PARA: Name of the last opened file. If no file is open, is NULL.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.Visionpro.ImageFile
' Get the name of the last opened file and display it Dim strFileName As String strFileName = imagefile.FileName MessageBox.Show("Last file opened was:" + strFileName)

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Item(System.Int32)
member.param: The index of the item to get.
member.summary: Gets the item at the specified index. In C#, this property is the indexer for the collection.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Get an image from fileDim ImageFile as New CogImageFile Dim Image As CogImage8Grey imagefile.Open("c:\image.bmp", CogImageFileModeConstants.Read) Image = imagefile.Item(0) imagefile.Close()

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.SuspendChangedEvent
member.summary: Temporarily suspends the raising of the Changed event. May be called more than once, and a corresponding call to ResumeAndRaiseChangedEvent must be made for each call to SuspendChangedEvent.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.ResumeAndRaiseChangedEvent
member.summary: Re-enables raising of the Changed event after SuspendChangedEvent has been called. Also raises the Changed event if the ChangedEventSuspended count is reduced to zero and any changes were made while events were suspended. Must be called once for each call to SuspendChangedEvent.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Open(System.String,Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileModeConstants)

param.name: fileName
param.PARA: The name of the image file to open.

param.name: mode
param.PARA: A value that indicates that mode in which to open the image file.

exception.para: An error occurred while opening the specified file.
A supplied image file extension was not recognized.

member.summary: Open an image file.

remarks.PARA: Opens an image file using the image file provider that corresponds to the file's extension. If more than one image file provider supports the extension, the one selected is undefined.
If you do not specify an file open mode, defaults to Read .

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Append an image to a file Dim ImageFile1 As New CogImageFile ImageFile1.Open("c:\image.bmp", CogImageFileModeConstants.Read)

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Close
member.summary: Close an open image file.

remarks.PARA: Closes the open image file and sets the property to "". If an image file is not currently open, calling has no effect.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Append an image to a file Dim ImageFile1 As New CogImageFile Dim Image As CogImage8Grey ImageFile1.Open("c:\image.bmp", CogImageFileModeConstants.Read) Image = ImageFile1(0)

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Append(Cognex.VisionPro.ICogImage)

param.name: newImage
param.PARA: The to append to file.

member.summary: Append image to end of file.

exception.para: The image file is not opened in a mode that permits writing.
The image provider does not support multiple images.

remarks.PARA: Appends an image to the end of an image file.

event.para: The new image count is provided in .
The following state flag may be affected:

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Append an image to a file Dim ImageFile1 As New CogImageFile Dim Image As CogImage8Grey ImageFile1.Open("c:\image.bmp", CogImageFileModeConstants.Read) Image = ImageFile1(0) ImageFile1.Close()
Dim ImageFile2 As New CogImageFile ImageFile2.Open("c:\image_copy.bmp", CogImageFileModeConstants.Write) ImageFile2.Append(Image) ImageFile2.Close()

member.summary: Object supporting access to .bmp files.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileCDB
member.summary: Object supporting access to .cdb /.idb files.

remarks.PARA: Interface that supports access to Cognex image database (.cdb, .idb) files.
remarks.NOTE: When you save an image to a Cognex image file (.IDB) or Cognex image database (.CDB) using this tool, the tool saves the image, the selected space name of the image, and the coordinate space tree associated with the image. When you load an image from an .IDB or .CDB file, the selected space and the coordinate space tree are both restored as well.
